passives.effects: After taking damage from a [[champion]], gain '''bonus''' [[health regeneration]] per second equal to {{pp|0 to 5.625 for 11|round=3|type='''missing''' health|color=health|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=0.375 bonus health regeneration for every 1% missing health}} for 8 seconds. Reduced to{{ft|66% effectiveness|{{pp|0*0.66 to 5.625*0.66 for 11|round=4|type='''missing''' health|color=health|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=0.2475 bonus health regeneration for every 1% missing health}}}}if owned by {{tip|ranged}} champions or when triggered by [[area of effect]], [[damage over time]], or [[damage|proc]].
passives.name: Enduring Focus

passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{as|5 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] against [[minions]].
